QuestData.Title: Gargal, the Behemoth
QuestData.Description: You may not have noticed, but I'm pretty big, as far as orcs go.$b$bI make sure that my two pals here don't get into too much trouble. They're small, and they don't have a big shield like me. I'm big, and I can handle a few monsters hitting me! Plus, if I'm careful, I can usually get them to hit my shield instead!$b$bI can protect you, too. Come on, let's go practice for a bit. I'll make sure the enemies attack me, and not you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Gargal's Shield Wall and Gargal's Mighty Shout.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't worry, little $r. I'll protect you.
QuestData.RewardText: See? No need to worry when Gargal is around. Just let me know, and I'll protect you from the monsters.
